children.text:
FaxFile allows you to easily send documents stored on your android to any fax machine in the USA, Canada, and many other countries around the world. It is as simple as selecting a file and entering a fax number. 
 
Faxes to the USA and Canada are 10 credits per page (per recipient) and credits may be purchased in the application through the Google Play Store for as little as $ 2.49 for 50 credits. No additional account setup or subscription is required. Please note, credits are charged for all faxes and credits are charged at the time that you initiate a fax. Canceling a fax once it has been started will not result in a return of credits. 
 
FaxFile supports documents in PDF and Microsoft office word format (.doc or .docx) and images in PNG and JPG formats (such as the images saved by the camera, if your android has one). 
 
FaxFile requires internet access to function. Your service provider may charge additional fees for internet access. You are solely responsible for all charges incurred and FaxFile will not reimburse you for any such charges.

Start FaxFile and add at least one document and one recipient, press Continue, add credits if needed, and press Send. 
 
Files can be selected by using the built-in FaxFile browser, or you can use your own file browser, or you may select an image from your media gallery. 
 
Recipients can be selected from your contact list, or you may enter a fax number directly. Up to 10 documents and recipients can be selected. 
 
FaxFile will use your android's internet connection to schedule your fax and transfer the files to our servers where they will be converted to a faxable format. 
 
When the files have been transferred, converted, and credits have been paid for, your fax will be sent to all your recipients. You can check the current progress of your faxes on the status screen. 
 
Press the next button to begin!
